entry.title: Thursday: Chance of showers. High 14. POP 30%
entry.summary: Sunny early this morning then a mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of showers late this morning. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this afternoon. High 14. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MDT Thursday 05 May 2016
